item.title: Download CrystalMark Retro 2.0.7
item.description: CrystalMark Retro allows you to evaluate hard drive performance thoroughly. With CrystalMark Retro, you can measure both sequential and random read/write speeds of your hard drive. Sequential read/write speed refers to the speed of accessing data in a linear or sequential manner, while random read/write speed refers to the speed of accessing data in a non-sequential or random manner .
